name: BOMBICLES
description:
If you have any problems with the browser version, download the windows version below!

Made for the GBJAM 5, this is a simple 4-color game inspired by good old GameBoy games.Collect all the coins in each of the 10 levels while evading or destroying the baddies.

I had less time than expected for the jam, but I tried my best. I managed to put in about 14 hours of work in for this submission. Enjoy!

Give me a follow for more small games like this!
